bioAsHtml: Ted is a full-stack software developer for over 10 years and Java enthusiast. He likes clean and modular code, enjoys Agile projects and has a passion for trying our new things. He tries to learn & teach every day, and occasionally is even able to blog about it :-) Currently works for First8, a Java software development company based in the Netherlands, as a Java/Groovy/Grails instructor.

acceptedTalks.title: Web Application Development using Grails & Docker

bio: Ted is a full-stack software developer for over 10 years and Java enthusiast. He likes clean and modular code, enjoys Agile projects and has a passion for trying our new things. He tries to learn & teach every day, and occasionally is even able to blog about it :-) Currently works for First8, a Java software development company based in the Netherlands, as a Java/Groovy/Grails instructor.
